title: Senior Full Stack Developer
description: We are seeking a skilled Senior Full Stack Developer to join our dynamic team. You will be responsible for developing and maintaining web applications using modern technologies. The ideal candidate will have experience with both frontend and backend development, strong problem-solving skills, and the ability to work in a fast-paced environment.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
5+ years of experience in full stack development
Experience with React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Strong understanding of database design and optimization

title: Frontend React Developer
description: Join our innovative startup as a Frontend React Developer. You'll work on cutting-edge web applications, collaborate with designers and product managers, and contribute to our growing platform. We offer a flexible work environment and opportunities for professional growth.
requirements: Experience with state management (Redux, Context API)
Familiarity with modern build tools and workflows

title: Data Scientist
description: We are looking for a passionate Data Scientist to analyze large datasets and derive actionable insights. You will work with machine learning models, statistical analysis, and data visualization tools to solve complex business problems.
requirements: Master's degree in Data Science, Statistics, or related field
4+ years of experience in data science

title: Product Manager
description: Lead product development initiatives and drive product strategy. You will work closely with engineering, design, and marketing teams to deliver exceptional products that meet customer needs and business objectives.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Business, Engineering, or related field

title: Junior Software Engineer
description: Perfect opportunity for a recent graduate or junior developer to start their career. You'll work on various projects, learn from experienced developers, and contribute to our growing codebase. We provide mentorship and training programs.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Knowledge of at least one programming language

title: DevOps Engineer
description: Join our DevOps team to build and maintain scalable infrastructure. You'll work with containerization, CI/CD pipelines, and cloud platforms to ensure reliable and efficient software delivery.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with AWS, Docker, and Kubernetes
Knowledge of CI/CD tools and practices

title: UX/UI Designer
description: Create intuitive and beautiful user experiences for our digital products. You'll conduct user research, create wireframes and prototypes, and collaborate with development teams to implement designs.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Design, HCI, or related field
Proficiency in design tools like Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD

title: Backend Python Developer
description: Develop robust backend services and APIs using Python. You'll work with databases, implement business logic, and ensure scalable and maintainable code architecture.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with Django or Flask frameworks
Knowledge of database design and optimization

title: Mobile App Developer
description: Build native and cross-platform mobile applications for iOS and Android. You'll work with modern mobile development frameworks and collaborate with designers to create engaging user experiences.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Experience with React Native or Flutter

title: Machine Learning Engineer
description: Design and implement machine learning models and systems. You'll work on cutting-edge AI projects, optimize model performance, and deploy ML solutions to production environments.
requirements: Master's degree in Computer Science, ML, or related field
Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks
Experience with model deployment and MLOps
